entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning this afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:20 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 06:20 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023
